short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HeadSpace - Clear your mind while coding

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HeadSpace is a noise application used to help with improving focus and relaxation.  Its purpose is to assist the user to be more productive throughout their work session.
